name: Beautiful Kingdom
description:
Beautiful Kingdom is an RPG maker MZ asset game created by Adam Willson. The story is set in the world of Valnuk after a societal collapse. Hundreds of years later a strange curse has struck the land and an ancient technological civilization lays in slumber ready to rekindle an old war. You are a medieval spice trader finding your way in a crumbling world discovering that the struggle for survival can take you further than you ever imagined. 

Thank you for giving my game a try. It's about 2-3 hours following the main story. Have fun and please leave a comment for any future games I create.
